Career Development

From freshman year to beyond graduation, Alpha Zeta provides the resources and connections to launch your career

AZ Groups

Our signature program pairing members with industry-specific mentorship tracks

Investment Banking

Prepare for IB recruiting through technical training, networking guidance, and mock interviews with industry professionals.

Consulting

Master case interviews, develop problem-solving frameworks, and learn from brothers at top consulting firms.

Tech & Product

Navigate tech recruiting with resume workshops, coding prep, and connections to engineers and PMs at top companies.

Marketing & Brand

Build your marketing toolkit through brand strategy workshops, portfolio development, and agency connections.

Entrepreneurship

Explore startup culture, venture capital, and business creation with mentors who've built successful companies.

General Professional

Develop foundational career skills applicable across all industries, from networking to personal branding.

What You Get

The tools and support to succeed in any career path

Resume & Interview Prep

Work with experienced brothers to perfect your resume and practice for any interview format.

Alumni Network Access

Connect with 500+ alumni across industries for referrals, advice, and mentorship.

Weekly Skills Workshops

Learn Excel, SQL, case interviews, financial modeling, and more from peers and professionals.

Company Info Sessions

Get exclusive access to recruiting events and company presentations throughout the year.

1-on-1 Mentorship

Each new member is paired with an upperclassman mentor for personalized guidance.

Recruiting Support

From application review to offer negotiation, we support you every step of the way.

Where Our Members Work

Alpha Zeta alumni and members can be found at leading companies worldwide

Ready to Join Our Brotherhood?

Spring 2026 Rush begins January 15th. Take the first step toward a transformative college experience.

ALPHA ZETA

A professional business fraternity at the University of Southern California, dedicated to fostering brotherhood, professional excellence, and community service.
